Keysight Technologies has collaborated with IEEE UTM Student Branch to organize a seminar. In this seminar, the companyâ€™s overview will be shared along with Graduate Trainee Program (GTP) and Internship Program.

Grab this chance by joining this seminar to find out more about the career possibilities!
